text: waldhyn eamiluu alsayiyaat fi aldunya fakafaruu wesau allah lahum jaza' 'aemalahum alsayiyat alty emlwha bimithliha min eiqab allah fi alakhrt, wtghshahm dhllat whwan, walays lahum min eadhab allah min mane ymnehm 'iidha eaqbhm, ka'anama 'ulbst wujuhuhum taayifat min swad allayl almzlm. hwla' hum 'ahl alnaar maakithun fiha abdana
